channel.title: Financial Modeling & Analysis on
channel.description: Recent content in Financial Modeling & Analysis on

item.title: Statistique et probabilité pour la finance quantitative
item.description: Vous avez déjà des connaissances en finance et vous voulez les approfondir pour les monétiser et les diversifier ? Vous avez déjà des connaissances en trading et vous voulez apprendre le trading/la finance quantitative ? Vous êtes simplement une personne curieuse qui veut s'intéresser à ce sujet ? Si vous répondez à au moins une de ces questions, je vous souhaite la bienvenue à ce cours. Toutes les applications du cours seront réalisées à l'aide de Python.

item.title: Corp. Finance #14 Financing-Commons Stock & Preferred Stock
item.description: This course will cover corporate financing options using common stock and preferred stock. We will include many example problems, both in the format of presentations and Excel worksheet problems. The Excel worksheet presentations will include a downloadable Excel workbook with at least two tabs, one with the answer, the second with a preformatted worksheet that can be completed in a step-by-step process along with the instructional videos. When thinking about financing options for a corporation we can break them into the two main groups of debt financing and equity financing.

item.title: Corporate Finance #11 Capital Budgeting
item.description: This course will show how to make capital budgeting decisions from a corporate finance perspective. We will include many example problems, both in the format of presentations and Excel worksheet problems. The Excel worksheet presentations will include a downloadable Excel workbook with at least two tabs, one with the answer, the second with a preformatted worksheet that can be completed in a step-by-step process along with the instructional videos. Capital budgeting decisions involve planning for projects and future cash flows extending more then one year into the future.

item.title: Financial Analysis and Financial Modeling using MS Excel
item.description: You're looking for a complete course on understanding Financial Analysis and Financial Modeling using MS Excel to drive business decisions, right? You've found the right Financial Analysis using MS Excel course! Financial Analysis and Financial analytics provides scientific support to decision-making concerning a firm's money related matters. This course addresses the topic of Financial analysis with a practical focus, focusing especially on demystifying analytics for finance managers, financial analysts from both statistical and computing point of view.

item.title: Aprende Análisis Técnico de Figuras - Chartismo
item.description: A lo largo de este curso vamos a aprender todo acerca del Análisis Técnico principalmente enfocándonos en el Análisis Chartista basándonos principalmente en el Precio y Volumen para poder Analizar e Identificar patrones y figuras como: los Triángulos, Hombros Cabezas Hombro, Doble/Triple Techo/Suelo y muchas otras figuras para poder ganar dinero en los mercados financieros tanto para Acciones, Forex, Criptomonedas, Materias Primas o cualquier otro activo bursátil. No requiere experiencia previa ya que empezamos desde los conceptos mas básicos hasta un nivel mas avanzado.

item.title: Financial Statement analysis
item.description: عالم تحليل الاداء المالي للشركات وعالم الاستثمار قد يكون فيه بعض الغموض لشريحة واسعة من الناس, لهذا السبب قررنا انشاء كورس "تحليل القوائم المالية" حتى يكون بمقدورك تحليل سلوك الشركات المالي بشكل سليم. الكورس هو كورس استثماري يهدف إلى ممارسة وفهم عالم الاستثمار طويل الأجل من خلال دراسة وتحليل البيانات المالية للشركات لفهم سلوك الشركة المالي الكورس سيعطيك خريطة الطريق للاستثمار الأنسب ولفهم كيفية عمل الشركات "وراء الكواليس". ميزة أخرى كبيرة للكورس، ليست فقط في الاستثمار ، ولكن من حيث أنها تفتح لك عالما جديدا ، وجهة نظر أخرى حول السلوك المالي لحياتك, لا سيما ان كنت صاحب بيزنس او شخص يريد ان يتعلم موضوع التحليل المالي للشركات لاي سبب كان.

item.title: Aprende Análisis Técnico Avanzado Ondas Elliott y Fibonacci
item.description: A lo largo de este curso vamos a ver todo lo relacionado al uso del Análisis Técnico de una forma Avanzada basándonos en la Teoría de las Ondas de Elliott y en Fibonacci para poder analizar activos de nuestro interés de una manera profesional para poder hacer Trading y operaciones en cualquier tipo de mercado tanto de Criptomonedas, Acciones, Forex, Futuros, para poder ganar dinero en el mercado de manera consistente.

item.title: Business Finance and Financial Modeling
item.description: Uplatz provides this comprehensive course on Business Finance and Financial Modeling. The Business Finance course will help get familiarized with the concepts of Corporate Finance, how to raise funds for your business, how to manage the funds, along with risk management. The Financial Modeling course will equip you with the methodology, tools, and techniques used in Financial Modeling, how to develop models for financial forecasting, how to manage the cash flow appropriately, and so on.

item.title: Data science for algorithmic trading
item.description: It is with pride that I offer this data science course for algorithmic trading. It is the fruit of several years of work in the field to truly understand all the subtleties of the world of quantitative finance. Using libraries will allow you to do complex mathematical calculations applied to finance in just a few lines of code. We will see how to create an algorithm for trading from data import to automatic positions.

item.title: Data science pour le trading algorithmique (2020)
item.description: C'est avec plaisir que je vous offre ce cours de data science pour le trading algorithmique. C'est le fuit de plusieurs années de travail dans de nombreux domaines pour comprendre les subtilités du monde de la finance quantitative. Nous utiliserons des librairies python qui nous permettrons de faire facilement des algorithmes mathématiques très complexes appliqués à la finance avec peu de code. Le fil conducteur de cette formation sera la création d'un algorithme profitable avec plus de 50% de gain annuel sur me NASDAQ 100.

item.title: Standard Costing And Variance Analysis Full Course
item.description: Administrative and cost management tools The course will introduce subject management topics to be covered throughout the course, comparing management accounting and accounting so that we are in the right frame of mind as we move forward. The study will explain and analyze general costs and cost variance analyzes, providing an overview of the cost analysis concepts that we will go into in detail in later sections. We will explain the analysis of sales differences, discuss when they can be used and how to calculate sales variations.

item.title: Master Reporting Automation with Google Sheets
item.description: Learn to solve any business modeling task you might ever experience! Have you ever felt that you're regularly repeating some tasks in Google Sheets or Excel? Have you ever thought about the time you would save if you would automate those tasks? All the work you're doing in a repetitive manner in Google Sheets or Excel could be automated. It requires no coding skills, add-ons, or special tools - all you need to know is how to execute advanced formula combinations that will do all the automation for you.
